description: These simple homemade brownies make for a fun, shareable Halloween treat.
keywords: Brownies,Low salt,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Halloween,Sesame free
name: M&M's Monster Mash Brownies Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 12 pieces green and orange candy melts
4 tsp Macro Organic Virgin Coconut Oil

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 160°C (325°F). Grease 16 mini muffin cups and set aside.
Using electric mixer, beat sugar and eggs. Fold in melted butter until blended; stir in vanilla. Combine cocoa powder, flour and salt; fold into egg mixture. Fold in half of the M&M’s.
Spoon batter into mini muffin cups. Bake for 15 to 20 minutes or until a few moist crumbs still adhere to toothpick when inserted in center of brownie. Let cool completely on rack.
Melt green candy melts and 2 tsp coconut oil in heatproof bowl set over saucepan of barely simmering water for 4 to 6 minutes or until easily stirred. Repeat with orange candy melts.
Spoon coloured melted chocolate randomly over each brownie, swirling with skewer or tip of paring knife. Sprinkle with remaining M&M’s. Refrigerate until set.
